meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Dianthus, including carnations and pinks.
meanings.sent1: The dianthus in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I picked a lovely dianthus for my mom's birthday bouquet.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide his acorn in the dianthus pot.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and colorful as a dianthus in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The sweet fragrance of the dianthus filled the air with joy.

meanings.definition: The flower of a plant of the genus Dianthus.
meanings.sent1: Each dianthus had a unique pattern on its petals.
meanings.sent2: The dianthus added a pop of color to the flower arrangement.
meanings.sent3: The tiny bee buzzed happily around the dianthus, collecting nectar.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the gentle sway of a dianthus in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The delicate dianthus stood out among the other flowers in the garden.
